column1: [[Image:The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings (Canada).jpg
This version of '''The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings''' (To Honor the Silver Anniversary) was published specifically for Canada by [[Methuen
column2: Methuen Publications]]. It is illustrated by [[Paul Rivoche]] with images loosely based on the images from [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
